GameConditionDef.label: volcanic ash
GameConditionDef.description: Ash from a nearby volcanic eruption is filling the sky. The sun is blocked and the acrid air burns the lungs. The cloud will last several days.
GameConditionDef.descriptionFuture: a nearby eruption will send a cloud of ash over [map_definite] for [gameConditionDuration_duration], darkening the sky and making it hard to breathe
GameConditionDef.endMessage: Most of the ash has settled.
GameConditionDef.letterText: Ash from a nearby volcanic eruption is filling the sky. The sun is blocked and the acrid air burns the lungs. The cloud will last several days.

GameConditionDef.label: volcanic debris
GameConditionDef.letterText: A nearby volcanic eruption is showering the region with molten lava!
GameConditionDef.description: A nearby volcanic eruption is showering the region with molten lava!

GameConditionDef.label: lava flow
GameConditionDef.description: Lava has begun to pour into the area. It will flow over the low-lying volcanic rock, but spare the other terrain. Keep your colonists out of harm's way!

GameConditionDef.label: darkened skies
GameConditionDef.description: Thick black clouds are blocking out the sky and sun.

GameConditionDef.label: bioluminescent spores
GameConditionDef.description: Some variety of fungus is blossoming and releasing bioluminescent spores! The spores are strangely beautiful and pose no danger.
GameConditionDef.letterText: Some variety of fungus is blossoming and releasing bioluminescent spores! The spores pose no danger, and the shimmering visuals will brighten the mood of anyone who sees them.

GameConditionDef.label: windy
GameConditionDef.description: Winds are much stronger in this area.

GameConditionDef.label: initial drought conditions
GameConditionDef.description: The initial signs of a drought. If it continues, a full drought will occur.

GameConditionDef.label: drought
GameConditionDef.description: A prolonged period of low rainfall. Plants will grow slower during a drought.
GameConditionDef.letterText: Due to a recent lack of rain, a drought has begun. Outdoor plants will grow significantly slower.

GameConditionDef.label: heat vent emissions
GameConditionDef.description: Heat from a nearby underground vent is raising the temperature in the area.

GameConditionDef.label: deep freeze
GameConditionDef.description: An ancient, mysterious device is dramatically lowering temperatures in the area.

GameConditionDef.label: gill rot
GameConditionDef.description: Fish populations are slowly declining due to a parasitic fungus known as gill rot. The fungus is harmless to people.
GameConditionDef.letterText: A parasitic fungus called gill rot has appeared among the local fish populations. While harmless to humans, the fungus will cause fish populations to steadily decline for some time.\n\nLow fish populations will make fishing less productive.
